meta.notes: Vague, reusable intelligence cards. Each can be true/false/partial/progaganda.

cards.title: Shifting Frontlines
cards.text: Recent engagements suggest the enemy is no longer reacting—they are anticipating. Predictive patterns remain unclear.

cards.title: Logistical Drag
cards.text: Supply efficiency across the sector has degraded. Whether due to sabotage, misallocation, or simple attrition remains unconfirmed.

cards.title: Overextension Risk
cards.text: Command analysts warn that continued advances may be stretching available forces beyond sustainable limits.

cards.title: Unexpected Resistance
cards.text: Opposition forces have displayed coordination inconsistent with prior intelligence assessments.

cards.title: Distorted Vox Traffic
cards.text: Encrypted vox-bursts of unknown origin have been detected. Translation attempts remain inconclusive.

cards.title: Civilian Sightings
cards.text: Unverified reports indicate increased civilian movement in contested regions—cause unknown.

cards.title: Echoes in the Warp
cards.text: Astropathic choirs report recurring disturbances, though no direct manifestations have occurred.

cards.title: False Silence
cards.text: Several auspex stations have gone quiet. Whether destroyed or intentionally dark is unknown.

cards.title: Weapons Activation Signatures
cards.text: Energy readings suggest dormant systems may have been brought online somewhere in the sector.

cards.title: Force Concentration
cards.text: Enemy troop movements imply a massing of strength—location and intent remain unclear.

cards.title: Unidentified Commander
cards.text: Multiple engagements reference a single coordinating presence. No confirmed identity.

cards.title: Unusual Loss Ratios
cards.text: Casualty reports indicate outcomes deviating significantly from projected combat models.

cards.title: Temporary Lapse
cards.text: Surveillance suggests a brief reduction in enemy readiness. Duration unknown.

cards.title: Disputed Authority
cards.text: Intercepted communications hint at internal disagreement among hostile leadership elements.

cards.title: Abandoned Assets
cards.text: Recon flights report potential materiel left unsecured following recent battles.

cards.title: Unclaimed Ground
cards.text: Several regions appear strategically valuable yet remain uncontested—for now.

cards.title: Command Friction
cards.text: Differing strategic doctrines among allied forces have slowed unified response.

cards.title: Morale Strain
cards.text: Extended operations are beginning to impact force morale across multiple detachments.

cards.title: Questioned Intelligence
cards.text: Recent outcomes have led some commanders to doubt the accuracy of central intelligence.

cards.title: Resource Prioritization Conflicts
cards.text: Multiple high-priority requests now exceed available support capacity.

cards.title: Ill-Omened Victory
cards.text: Recent success has been marked by anomalous casualties and unexplained system failures.

cards.title: Pattern Repetition
cards.text: Analysts note recurring tactical motifs across unrelated engagements.

cards.title: Lingering Aftermath
cards.text: Battlefields thought cleared continue to generate intermittent alerts.

cards.title: The Silence
cards.text: No guidance has been received through expected channels. Interpretations vary.

cards.title: Conflicting Reports
cards.text: Multiple sources describe the same event in mutually exclusive terms.

cards.title: Delayed Transmissions
cards.text: Several data-packets arrived outside expected timeframes, raising authenticity concerns.

cards.title: Propaganda Spike
cards.text: An increase in morale broadcasts has been detected across hostile channels.

cards.title: Overconfidence Warning
cards.text: Analysts caution against recent assumptions of enemy collapse.
